paper.title: The equality problem for vector addition systems is undecidable

author.org: Project MAC, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, Mass. 02139, USA

paper.abstract: Abstract We demonstrate the usefulness of Petri nets for treating problems about vector addition systems by giving a simple exposition of Rabinu0027s proof of the undecidability of the inclusion problem for vector addition system reachability sets, and then proceed to show that the inclusion problem can be reduced to the equality problem for reachability sets.
